remarks: The value of vector addition in the dual of a vector space is a functional.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualvaddcl.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvaddcl.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvaddcl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) $.
ldualvaddcl.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualvaddcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualvaddcl.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
ldualvaddcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G .+ H ) e. F ) $.
